name: Pico Pass
description:
A game made in 1 hour and 4 minutes for Trijam #122: The 3 hour game jam.

The jam theme is: Transformation; Micro things

Scale the rotating box to traverse the walls.

To play use the SPACE button or CLICK/TAP the screen everywhere.

Music by pauliuw:
https://opengameart.org/content/music-loops

SFX by Fupi:
https://opengameart.org/content/plingy-coin
